item.description:
Please note that this an advanced hike. Please feel free to sign up if only you know you can do it.

If interested in the following, please put yourself on the established waiting list. A yes list will be provided as soon as possible.

All attendees must read, understand and agree to the waiver/liability as outlined by this website.

Hike description: We will meet at the Lincoln Woods Trailhead and car pool to the Whitehouse Trail. We will hike up the Liberty Spring Trail, across the Franconia Ridge Trail, Osseo Trail then Lincoln Woods Trail to the Lincoln Woods Trailhead .
Total distance is 10.63 miles. Book time is 7 hr 9 min.
item.how_to_find_us: WE WILL BE IN A SILVER FOUR DOOR LEGACY SUBARU
item.name: MT LIBERTY & MT FLUME ADVANCED HIKE
